body_html:
It's probable that I should split that into two issues. I don't think the broadcasted arithmetic is the only issue with non-fused BN when using NCHW. And anyway, as far as I'm aware, there's no multiplication equivalent to bias_add, so there's not a good way to implement the scale operation.

Certainly there is some problem here at a lower level than non-fused BN, but in practice my models ran fine as soon as I switched to the fused BN, so perhaps those effects are less important.

body:
It's probable that I should split that into two issues. I don't think the broadcasted arithmetic is the only issue with non-fused BN when using NCHW. And anyway, as far as I'm aware, there's no multiplication equivalent to `bias_add`, so there's not a good way to implement the scale operation.

Certainly there is some problem here at a lower level than non-fused BN, but in practice my models ran fine as soon as I switched to the fused BN, so perhaps those effects are less important.
